post_title: SGC T206s for sale. Removed NLfS
post_content: Updated 11-27 NLFS. . All of the cards in my collection are clean, so these are all nice. Shipping $5 1st card, $2 each additional.  Buy 5 or more, shipping is free. Buy 10 or more, shipping is free and 5% discount on total purchase.  Send a pm and I will answer them in order received. If you want pics, please send cell# for texted photos.  "I'll take it" with payment trumps any other ongoing discussions. PP F&F or Venmo.
